question:
Which of the following sentences are correct regarding the Greenhouse effect?
1) The name of the Climate change legislation passed in India
2) The soothing effect of a green Painted house
3) When the gasses in our atmosphere trap heat resulting in the temperature increase
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Earth receives solar radiation from the sun. Some of which is absorbed by the Earth while some is reflected back to the space. Some radiations are also trapped in the atmosphere due to the presence of some gases like carbon dioxide etc causing Green house effect.
